import React from 'react' function Controls(props) { const {gr,setGr,ch,st} = props const addValue = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const index = document.getElementById("input1") const value = document.getElementById("input2") console.log(st) console.log(ch) const myStruc = (st.find(e => e.id === ch).tile) //array of coordinates const newGrid = gr.slice() newGrid[myStruc[0]][myStruc[1]] = value setGr(newGrid) } return (
see items
) } export default Controls
